column4: ok, so I enabled the Mini-PCI in my BIOS, but in Network Tools under Network Devices I still don't see anything available besides Loopback Interface
right where i said :) run "sudo gedit /etc/network/interface"
When I try to enter my password, I type it in and hit enter. I see no keystrokes, but then i hit enter and says its wrong
in the terminal, when you type your password, it doesn't show up as anything, for security
just type it in exactly how it should be
Yeah, but then I hit enter after typing it in and it says it's wrong
did you put it in yourself?
do you have a physical switch for your wireless card?
